problem.p: Come back to this question after you consider, try to do, or complete the activity.
Choose your level of participation in the Build: Cardboard Table activity:

choicegroup.label: Choose your level of participation in the Build: Tensegrity Sculpture activity:
choicegroup.choice: I have done the activity and have shared in discussion
I intend to do the activity and share in discussion
I want to do the activity, but cannot get the materials
I want to do the activity, but had trouble and did not complete
I never intended to do this activity or have decided not to do it

div.p: Thank you for letting us know! Having the information on your completion, intent, and limitations will help us with future activities in the course.
If you are on the Certificate Track, you will receive 1 point for completing the activity and sharing in discussion, as self-reported above.
